main event: A semi-sphere shaped UFO was sighted and photographed near Red Bud, Illinois on April 23, 1950.
interesting points: The object was reddish in color and made of a clear metallic substance., The sighting occurred in a hunting area where the witness was trying to photograph wildlife., The UFO was described as about thirty feet in diameter and hovered motionlessly before taking off at a high speed., The witness experienced tremors from the shock of seeing the object., A newsboy named Donald Gent also reported a similar sighting in the area on the same day.
witness description: Dean Morgan, a hunting club member, and a newsboy named Donald Gent.
